## Summary
- Enables exclusive fullscreen mode for the exported game (window/size/mode=3)
- Hides and confines the mouse cursor during gameplay for immersive experience
- Shows cursor in pause menu (ESC) so users can interact with menu buttons

## Changes
- **project.godot**: Added `window/size/mode=3` for exclusive fullscreen
- **game_manager.gd**: Set `Input.MOUSE_MODE_CONFINED_HIDDEN` on game start
- **pause_menu.gd**: Toggle cursor visibility (CONFINED when paused, CONFINED_HIDDEN when playing)

## Test plan
- [ ] Build the project to .exe
- [ ] Launch the exe - should start in fullscreen
- [ ] Verify cursor is hidden during gameplay
- [ ] Press ESC to open pause menu - cursor should appear
- [ ] Resume game - cursor should hide again
- [ ] Mouse should not be able to leave the game window

Fixes #119
